name: WinGreen Marketing Systems
tag_list: lead-generation, marketing, consulting, sales, salesforce, demand-generation, sales-enablement, email-marketing, online-marketing, seo, sem
overview:
WinGreen Marketing Systems is an online content marketing agency that provides marketing, lead generation and sales force automation services to manufacturers and service providers in the technology industries.

The company’s integrated online sales and marketing services include campaign management, client-specific marketing assets (e.g. webcast content, white papers, newsletter templates, podcasts), email marketing, Web-based marketing and advertising, Web analytics, Web visitor tracking, sales force automation, and customer relationship management.

The WinGreen System of Marketing™ is a proven lead-to-sale process that is managed by experienced client account managers who provide personalized marketing consulting and utilize WinGreen’s massive in-the-cloud software infrastructure to plan and execute lead generation campaigns reaching tens of millions of target prospects. Delivered through a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) model, The WinGreen System Architecture™ includes CRM, sales force automation, data de-duplication, bulk email software, webcast hosting, and web visitor tracking – with no IT investment required by the customer. The result is a comprehensive marketing system that delivers predictable, consistent, repeatable outcomes.

WinGreen Marketing Systems is headquartered in Downingtown, Pennsylvania, and is a Salesforce.com partner.

To learn more about WinGreen Marketing Systems, call: Boston: 978-212-9467 Philadelphia: 610-810-1707 Chicago: 312-GROWTH-4 (312-476-9844) Silicon Valley: 650-LEAD GEN (650-532-3436) or visit http://www.WinGreenMarketing.com/learnmore.aspx.
